LanguageData.GS_Brazier.label: blood-brazier
LanguageData.GS_Brazier.description: A bowl-shaped furnishing used to hold fire. Produces red light over a large area. The sanguine glow is particularly pleasing to individuals with the bloodfeeder gene.
LanguageData.GS_Holy_Brazier.label: holy-brazier
LanguageData.GS_Holy_Brazier.description: A bowl-shaped furnishing used to hold fire. Produces white light over a large area. The holy glow is particularly pleasing to individuals with the angelic halo gene.
LanguageData.GS_Tox_Brazier.label: tox-brazier
LanguageData.GS_Tox_Brazier.description: A bowl-shaped furnishing used to hold fire. Produces green light over a large area. The sickly glow is particularly pleasing to individuals with the pollution stimulus gene.
